snippet: The police announced the holiday initiative, which focuses on violations outlined in the mayor’s plan to eliminate traffic deaths, on the same day a 62-year-old woman was killed by a bus in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The police announced the holiday initiative, which focuses on violations outlined in the mayor’s plan to eliminate traffic deaths, on the same day a 62-year-old woman was killed by a bus in Brooklyn.

headline.main: New York City Cracking Down on Drivers Near Senior Centers
